title: Github Forensics
description: A client has requested assistance after a network  compromise caused a full outage. Preliminary forensic analysis shows the attack originated from a single user account, indicating a potential insider threat. Investigate the incident to identify the insider and determine the actions taken during the attack. You have been given the compromised user's github profile - https://github.com/EMarseille99 What is the well known RAT tool that the inisder forked?
